pages.text: Focuses have their own specialize enchantments, but not all Focuses can be enchanted nor accept every enchantments. There are many enchantments that are only applicable to certain Focuses.

pages.title: Potency
pages.text: Potency increases the damage of your spells.

pages.title: Duration
pages.text: Your spells and your summons lasts longer.

pages.title: Radius
pages.text: Increases the radius of your spells, this generally means any explosive spells has a higher explosive radius. For certain spells, radius allows spells to more accurately find the nearest enemy to hit.

pages.title: Burning
pages.text: Your spells sets targets on fire or extends how long the target remains burning.

pages.title: Range
pages.text: Your spells goes further away. Can reach up to 10 Levels with 1 Block per level. The most common of enchantments.

pages.title: Life Absorb
pages.text: Your spells absorb health from targets when hit. Very Rare and is not compatible with Potency.

pages.title: Magnetize
pages.text: Your spells immediately pulls blocks broken by them into your inventory. Very Rare.

pages.title: Velocity
pages.text: Projectiles made from your spells move quicker.
